attacks.name: Full Blitz
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 Lightning Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Tag Bolt GX
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Lightning Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), this attack does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
